pkgmetadata.longdescription: C library and command-line tools for reading and writing tar, cpio, zip, ISO, and other archive formats.

use.flag: Allow accessing bzip2-compressed archives through libbz2 (which comes with app-arch/bzip2). This only affects libarchive's native support: bsdtar will keep using bunzip2 as a filter if that's not built-in.
Use file flags from sys-fs/e2fsprogs headers instead of virtual/os-headers headers
Enable support for LZ4 compression using app-arch/lz4

Allow accessing gzip-compressed archives through sys-libs/zlib. This only affects libarchive's native support: bsdtar will keep using gunzip as a filter if that's not built-in. It's also needed for supporting extraction of ZIP files.
Enable support for zstd compression using app-arch/zstd
